issue.title: [C++] Validate formatting of compute function docstrings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14768](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14768). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are a couple rules to watch out for when writing compute function docstrings that are only informally (and not consistently) enforced during code review. Ideally we should include a runtime validation routine for them.
